name: Search Zendesk tickets for specific keywords and add them to Airtable
description:
When new tickets are received in Zendesk, Make searches those tickets for pre-defined keywords and if the tickets contain them, it's added as records in Airtable which you can use for market research.
Please copy and use this [Airtable template](https://airtable.com/shrLyBQGznIyULxQ4/tblYkNeodmaWk5XQH/viwDQwaO0agxTKFng?blocks=hide/xxx) for the scenario to work without further settings.
